steps.text: Aerospace teams are drowning in documents. Thousands of pages across hundreds of deliverables. Each one could contain a mission-critical error, hidden in plain sight.

The standards are endless. Mil Standard four ninety-eight. D-O one seventy-eight C. I triple E eight thirty. A-S ninety-one hundred. Manual review takes weeks, and still misses twenty percent of critical issues.
A missed requirement cascades. A defective deliverable ships. The cost to fix grows ten times with every phase. The old way is broken.
Introducing AEGIS. The Aerospace Engineering Governance and Inspection System. Purpose-built for classified networks. Zero cloud dependency. Completely air-gapped.
One hundred and five quality checkers activate simultaneously. Real-time severity grading. Automated deduplication. Twelve integrated modules, working in concert. The system comes alive.
Drop a document. AEGIS dissects every sentence, every paragraph, every cross-reference. Over one hundred quality categories, analyzed in under sixty seconds.
One hundred and five configurable quality checkers. Grammar. Compliance. Style. Readability. Acronyms. Cross-references. Every issue is deduplicated, severity-graded, and triaged for action.

Statement Forge extracts every shall, must, and will directive from your documents. Categorizes by type. Assigns responsible roles. Then compares across versions, so you can track exactly what changed.

Every role, discovered automatically. Project Manager. Systems Engineer. Quality Lead. A living dictionary that grows with every scan. Adjudication workflows. R-A-C-I matrix generation. Inheritance mapping. Zero manual data entry.

Side-by-side proposal analysis. Financial extraction from any format. Red flag detection per FAR fifteen point four-oh-four. Deviation heatmaps. Vendor scores from A through F. All data. No guesswork.

Every U-R-L in the document, tested automatically. Multiple validation strategies including S-S-L bypass, single sign-on authentication, and headless browser rendering for military and government sites. Six thousand links validated, with zero false positives.

Five learning modules that remember how you work. Document review. Statement forge. Roles. Hyperlink validator. Proposal compare. Every correction becomes a pattern. Every pattern stays on your machine.

One hundred and five checkers. One hundred ninety-three A-P-I endpoints. Five hundred forty-nine narrated voice clips. One hundred thirty-seven version releases. Seven supported file formats. Four extraction strategies. Twelve integrated modules. One unified platform.
Pure Flask and vanilla JavaScript. No frameworks. No dependencies you don't control. SQLite for persistence. Canvas for visualization. Every line of code serves exactly one purpose.
No internet required. No cloud dependency. No telemetry. One hundred ninety-five pre-packaged dependencies. A complete offline installation in minutes. Your data never leaves the building.

Already deployed inside classified enclaves. Department of Defense facilities. Northrop Grumman secure networks. Windows single sign-on authentication. SharePoint integration. Built for the environments that need it most.
Every module, every checker, every learning system. All converging on one mission. Helping engineers write better documents. Faster. More accurately. Every single time.
AEGIS. Built by engineers. For engineers.
